thag2.34:1.1_0: I’ve seen lay disciples who have memorized discourses,
thag2.34:1.3_0: But they’re obsessed with jeweled earrings,
thag2.34:1.4_0: concerned for their partners and children.
thag2.34:2.1_0: To be honest, they don’t know Dhamma,
thag2.34:2.2_0: even though they say “Sensual pleasures are impermanent”.
thag2.34:2.3_0: They don’t have the power to cut their lust,
thag2.34:2.4_0: which is why they cling to children, wives, and wealth.
